Pre-Game Insights: Brady Singer is 0-1 over his last three starts but hasn't been pitching too badly.
Jared Jones has given up five earned runs over his last two starts in 13.1 innings.
Bobby Witt Jr. has hit a home run in two of the Royals' last three games against the Pirates.
Bobby Witt Jr. has scored at least one run in seven of the Royals' last eight day games against opponents that held a losing record.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Four of the Royals' last five games against National League opponents have gone OVER the total runs line.
Each of the Pirates' last three day games against American League opponents have gone UNDER the total runs line.
The 'Inning 1 OVER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Pirates' last three day games.
The 'Inning 1 UNDER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Royals' last five Sunday day games.
